controls.caption: Index of channel
controls.name: channelIndex
controls.description: Index of channel, starting from 0. Note: it is raw index, passed to OpenCV function "extractChannel". Remember, that OpenCV usually stores channels in BGR order, so, in the normal color image the value 0 corresponds to B channel, 1 corresponds to G, 2 corresponds to R (unlike usual RGB standard, where channel 0 is R, channel 1 is B, channel 2 is R)

controls.caption: Use GPU
controls.name: useGPU
controls.hint: Use OpenCV GPU optimization when possible
